meanings.sent1: The corynebacterium under the microscope looked like tiny rods.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study different species of corynebacterium to understand their characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The corynebacterium threw a tiny rod-shaped party under the lens.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bacteria, the corynebacterium stands tall like a rod.
meanings.sent5: The corynebacterium, with its rod shape, is easy to identify among other bacteria.

meanings.definition: Any bacterium belonging to the genus Corynebacterium.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian identified the corynebacterium causing the infection in the dog.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the antibiotic resistance of various corynebacterium strains.
meanings.sent3: The corynebacterium family reunion was a bacteria-filled affair.
meanings.sent4: Among the bacterial community, the corynebacterium is like a distinguished member of a club.
meanings.sent5: The corynebacterium, a member of its own genus, has unique characteristics compared to other bacteria.
